tool_description: The World History Timeline API by Pizza API is a comprehensive resource for exploring significant historical events from 3200 BCE to the year 2000. It provides access to a vast database of information on key moments in human history, organized in an easy-to-use format for developers.

api_list.name: Historic Event By Year
api_list.description: Retrieves all available historical events for a specified year.

required_parameters.name: year
required_parameters.description: The year for which historical events are requested.

api_list.name: Random Historic Event
api_list.description: Returns a random historical event along with the corresponding year.
